report.title: EBMS Occurrence Download Report - 2
report.description: Lists saved occurrences. Normally invoked easy download page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id and w.deleted=false JOIN samples sc on sc.id=o.sample_id and sc.deleted=false JOIN samples sp on sp.id=sc.parent_id and sp.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON sp.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON sc.location_id=l2.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: loc2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smp2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END
